statements: SELECT * FROM LuxuryTravelCompany ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT destination, price FROM LuxuryTravelCompany WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY rating ASC
SELECT id, destination, experience FROM LuxuryTravelCompany WHERE price < 2000 ORDER BY experience
SELECT * FROM LuxuryTravelCompany WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY destination DESC
SELECT destination, price, rating FROM LuxuryTravelCompany WHERE forecasted_demand < 50 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM LuxuryTravelCompany ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT destination, price, rating FROM LuxuryTravelCompany WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM LuxuryTravelCompany WHERE rating >= 4 AND forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT destination, experience FROM LuxuryTravelCompany WHERE rating = 5 AND forecasted_demand < 50;
SELECT id, destination, price FROM LuxuryTravelCompany WHERE price BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM travel_destinations;
SELECT destination_name, avg_expense FROM travel_destinations WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT destination_name, avg_expense FROM travel_destinations ORDER BY avg_expense DESC;
SELECT experience_name, price, rating FROM travel_experiences WHERE price <= 100;
SELECT destination_name, avg_expense FROM travel_destinations WHERE avg_expense < 500 ORDER BY avg_expense ASC;
SELECT destination_name, avg_expense FROM travel_destinations
SELECT * FROM travel_destinations INNER JOIN travel_experiences ON travel_destinations.destination_id = travel_experiences.destination_id
SELECT destination_name, region FROM travel_destinations WHERE avg_expense > 1000 ORDER BY region DESC

SELECT destination_name, avg_expense, COUNT(*) AS num_experiences FROM travel_destinations LEFT JOIN travel_experiences ON travel_destinations.destination_id = travel_experiences.destination_id GROUP BY destination_name, avg_expense
SELECT experience_name, price, rating FROM travel_experiences WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM Locations;
SELECT location_name, region FROM Locations ORDER BY region DESC;
SELECT experience_name, price FROM Experiences WHERE price < 100;
SELECT reservation_date, customer_name, customer_email FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, average_rating FROM Locations WHERE average_rating IS NOT NULL ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT location_name, region, average_rating FROM Locations ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT experience_name, price, rating FROM Experiences WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND reservation_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT location_name, region, average_rating FROM Locations WHERE region = 'Europe';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Reservations WHERE experience_id = 2 ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_destinations;
SELECT destination_name, average_trip_cost FROM luxury_travel_destinations ORDER BY average_trip_cost DESC;
SELECT destination_name, trend_rating FROM luxury_travel_destinations WHERE destination_id = 3;
SELECT experience_name, experience_cost, rating FROM luxury_travel_experiences WHERE destination_id = 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM travel_trends;
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_destinations;
SELECT destination_name, average_trip_cost FROM luxury_travel_destinations WHERE average_trip_cost > 5000;
SELECT destination_id, destination_name, trend_rating FROM luxury_travel_destinations ORDER BY destination_name DESC;

SELECT experience_name, experience_cost FROM luxury_travel_experiences INNER JOIN luxury_travel_destinations ON luxury_travel_experiences.destination_id = luxury_travel_destinations.destination_id WHERE luxury_travel_experiences.rating >= 4;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM travel_trends WHERE trend_rating <= 3 ORDER BY trend_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_destinations;
SELECT destination_name, region, avg_cost FROM luxury_travel_destinations;
SELECT destination_name, avg_cost FROM luxury_travel_destinations WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT customer_name, rating, review FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT experience_name, duration_hrs, cost FROM travel_experiences WHERE cost < 500 ORDER BY duration_hrs DESC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_destinations
SELECT destination_name, avg_cost FROM luxury_travel_destinations ORDER BY avg_cost DESC
SELECT customer_name, rating, review FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4
SELECT experience_name, cost, duration_hrs FROM travel_experiences WHERE duration_hrs >= 8 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT booking_date, total_cost FROM booking_history WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01'
